name: Crisis Inverted
flavor_text: Still a problem, only now it's inside out.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description:
Shots from this weapon knock the target back farther.
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: High-Caliber Rounds

perks.description:
Rounds ricochet off hard surfaces. 
  •  Increases stability 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Ricochet Rounds

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description:
Improved reload and range.
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Light Mag

perks.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.
perks.name: Outlaw

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
perks.name: Stats for All

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Tunnel Vision

perks.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.
perks.name: Rapid Hit

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure

perks.description: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.
perks.name: Opening Shot

perks.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
perks.name: Elemental Capacitor

perks.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.
perks.name: Focused Fury

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description: This weapon adapts its damage output and effectiveness against energy shields that don't match the weapon's damage type.
perks.name: Adaptive Munitions

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when out of combat.
perks.name: One Quiet Moment
